channel.title: Authors on Dr Daniel Yon
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Dr Daniel Yon

item.description:
I am a cognitive neuroscientist and experimental psychologist at Goldsmiths, University of London. Goldsmiths, University of London. Before joining the faculty in Goldsmiths in 2019, I was a postdoc at Birkbeck, University of London, where I am also an Honorary Research Fellow.

My research investigates how we perceive and interact with the world around us, with a particular focus on how our expectations and beliefs shape our perceptions and decisions. . I wrote about some of these ideas in this article for Aeon.

I use a mixture of behavioural, neuroimaging and computational techniques to answer these questions and am luck to work with an exceptional set of colleagues and collaborators. You can see some examples of our work below.

If you are interested in joining the group as a PhD student, postdoc or for some research experience, please feel free to get in touch.
